SELECT ic.comment_level AS commentLevel, ic.content AS content, ic.sepc_name AS specName, ic.created_time AS createdTime, u.face AS userFace, u.nickname AS nickname FROM items_comments ic JOIN users u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount AS price FROM items i JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN(price_discount) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name LIKE '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts DESC
tempSpec.price_discount ASC
i.item_name ASC

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount AS price FROM items i JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN(price_discount) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1 AND i.cat_id = #{paramsMap.catId} ORDER BY
i.sell_counts DESC
tempSpec.price_discount ASC
i.item_name ASC
